pages.title: Welcome to Spectrum!
pages.text: Spectrum is a full-feature mod about magic and exploration.

Spectrum is based on color mixing of the subtractive color system (CMYK). Subtractive color mixing may be familiar to you from painting with watercolors or printing.$(br2)Spectrums main colors are represented by gemstones, found in geodes scattered around the world, with the vanilla Amethyst representing the Magenta part of the spectrum.

pages.title: Progression System
pages.text: Spectrum comes with a complex progression system where you unlock new things as you progress.$(br)As you delve deeper, you will notice changes in the world. Differences, that only you can perceive.$(br2)Everything you learn will bring you closer to your final destination: Finding out what is waiting for you beneath the impenetrable bedrock floor.

No idea on how to progress? Take a look at your advancements. These give a lot of hints on what to do next.$(br2)$(br)Spectrum is still in heavy development. If you find a bug or have a suggestion, visit me in Spectrums Discord or report them on GitHub.$(br2)$(br)Have fun!$(br)                - DaFuqs
